title.rendered: Migrate Old WP Content to tagDiv Themes

content.rendered:
Services

Migrate old WordPress content to a new theme

Give your website a fresh and modern look with the tagDiv themes. Our team will migrate your old content and give your audience new reasons to return

Why choose us?

The stress of moving out of your theme is holding you back? Drop us a line. We make converting content from one theme to another easy. Have a team with unique combination of web development and web design skills migrate your content.

We are ready when you are!

  • Install and configure a tagDiv theme
  • Import the desired layouts
  • Adjust the design for your content
  • Create new awesome designs
  • Configuring the widgets

70$

per hour

Order Now

Related Services

Migrate you website from
another CMS to WordPress

Migrate your website from another CMS/HTML to WordPress. No hassle, no stress, just a friendly team on the email ready to make it happen for you.

Price: $70 per hour

See the package

Migrate website to
another server

Safely transfer your website to a new server and domain. We make migrating easy for you. Let the web development experts take care of everything and enjoy the results!

Price: $70 per hour

See the package

Explore more from Customization Services

Basic WordPress
& Plugins

Installation of the default WordPress CMS and the best plugins for your WP website. Get it right straight from the beginning!

Price: $48

Show me more

design & Content Management

Change the ‘not so beautiful’ pages into eye-catching content. Our web designers are ready to solve the challenge for you!

Price: $50 per hour

Show me more

Web Development Customizations

CSS, JavaScript, and PHP professional customization. Get the experts to work and give an exceptional facelift to your site!

Price: $70 per hour

Show me more

Page Speed
Optimization

Fed up with your slow loading WordPress site? Let us make the optimization and get the best loading speed for your website!

Price: $200

Show me more

Refresh & redesign your website!

Give your visitors countless new reasons to return and interact with your website site! Let us clean up the old website and refresh its design. A friendly team with the right skills is just a few clicks away.

Order Now $70/H
